snippet: Dilkhayot Kasimov, 26, was added as a defendant in the case of a group of Brooklyn men charged with trying to support the Islamic State.
abstract: Dilkhayot Kasimov is added as defendant in case of three Brooklyn men, Abdurasul Hasanovich Juraboev, Akhror Saidakhmetov and Abror Habibov, who were arrested in February for trying to join Islamic State; is believed to have worked with Habibov to raise money for their travels.
lead_paragraph: Dilkhayot Kasimov, 26, was added as a defendant in the case of a group of Brooklyn men charged with trying to support the Islamic State.

headline.main: 4th Brooklyn Man Is Charged in Plot to Join ISIS
headline.print_headline: 4th Brooklyn Man Is Charged in Plot to Join ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
